Uses of Class
brave.Tag

Packages that use Tag 
Package Description
brave  

  • Uses of Tag in brave

    Fields in brave declared as Tag 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Tag<BaggageField> Tags.BAGGAGE_FIELD
    This tags the baggage value using BaggageField.name() as the key.
    static Tag<Throwable> Tags.ERROR
    This tags "error" as the message or simple name of the throwable.
